snippet: President Obama is trying to beat back the illegal influx of Central American migrants while vowing to take unilateral action to move his stalled immigration agenda.
abstract: Pres Obama will not take firsthand look at escalating border crisis when he travels to Texas; border visit for Obama raises difficult political questions when he is struggling to balance his message on immigration.

byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and JULIA PRESTON
byline.contributor: Julie Hirschfeld Davis reported from Washington, and Julia Preston from New York.

lead_paragraph: President Obama is trying to beat back the illegal influx of Central American migrants while vowing to take unilateral action to move his stalled immigration agenda.

headline.main: Amid Influx of Migrants, Obama Is to Skip Border Visit on Texas Trip
headline.print_headline: Amid Influx of Migrants, Obama to Skip Border Visit on Texas Trip
